dataList.name: Rescued Time
dataList.desc: Have 1000 [LimitedTime] at the start of the Encounter

dataList.name: Accelerated Regeneration
dataList.desc: Turn End: If a Part is broken, spend 100 Time from that Part to recover from Part Broken state next turn.

dataList.name: Everyone's Time
dataList.desc: At 75% PV, enter the second phase. Upon phase change, recover PS up to 30, and divide the [LimitedTime] between all Parts as [OwnTime].
